org.multiverse.stms.gamma.transactions
Class SpeculativeGammaConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.multiverse.stms.gamma.transactions.SpeculativeGammaConfiguration

public final class SpeculativeGammaConfiguration
extends Object

The GammaStm uses a speculative mechanism (if enabled) to learn from executing transactions. Transactions start cheap and with a lot of features disabled, but once the speculation failed, the SpeculativeGammaConfguration is 'updated'.

This class is immutable.

Author:
Peter Veentjer.
